reviews.review: i have played through both portal games and have played portal 2 and portal 1's story mode's many times each and  i have been loving these games for a long time i dont have a lot of hours on steam because i originally played it on xbox but im in love with these games to anyone who hasn't experienced these games, its a must. i never write reviews but this game series and this game alone have made me want to take the time out of my day to write this. and one final thing even if recently they have fallen from grace, i still want to say, thank you valve
Sigo esperando por algo que nunca llegará.

Just awesome! Worth my money! Whether it was the single player version or the coop one, I just loved it! 
The single player version was more challenging than the coop version, but still I've got nothing but positive things to say about this game. If you're looking for a coop game to play with your friend AND making your brains work at their full power, then trying out this game is exactly what I'd expect out of a coop game which would include strategy and logic.
This is a great addition to the Portal story line.  It has more puzzles and backstory.  It also includes a co-op puzzles which add to the game.

Es muy bueno tiene nuevas mecanicas y trae mapas de la workshop y un modo cooperativo lo recomiendo

Please describe what you liked or disliked about this product and whether you recommend it to others. Please remember to be polite and follow the Rules and Guidelines. A description is required to post your recommendation

Świetna gierka. Portal ² jest znacznie dłuższy od jedynki, kampanię przyjemnie się przechodzi, są zwroty akcji, fajne postacie :D, sporo humoru i wspaniały klimat. Jest trochę nowych elementów gameplayowych jak np.żele. Oprócz tego świetny tryb współpracy, świetnie zrobiony, pozwala się cieszyć grą nawet po przejściu kampanii. Pod koniec fabuły, tak jak w jedynce jest fajna pioseneczka :). Od strony technicznej bardzo dobrze, świetna oprawa graficzna, zero bugów i crashy, bardzo dobra fizyka. Ścieżka dźwiękowa również świetna, zarówno ta z kampani jak i co-opa.
Лучшая игра в жанре головоломок, в разы лучше предыдущий части.

Great game. single player is amazing with a great story, fun yet challenging puzzles, cool gameplay, and funny diolague. Co op is the same but with friends! Me and my friends have a blast playing this game for speedruns or just a game to play one weekend. Portal 1 and 2 are both great games and would definitely recommend them!

I'm currently on my second playthrough of this game. I'm not as obsessed with it as some people were at the height of Portal's popularity, but it is a pretty great game. The puzzles support the story well, and most of them are pretty manageable even without help.
